availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Hezekiah H. Culbertson (Woodford County, Kentucky, farmer, merchant, and police judge)

body.p: Woodford County, Kentucky, farmer, merchant, and police judge. Ohio native. Married to Susan Kinkead Culbertson in Woodford County, Kentucky, in September 1847. Farmer in Woodford County in 1850. Merchant in Woodford County in 1860. Owned three enslaved persons in Woodford County in 1860. Chairman of the Versailles Board of Trustees in Woodford County in 1861. Merchant in Woodford County in 1863. Police judge in Woodford County from November 7, 1862, to 1863.

ab.bibl:
